data.title: Explore KKR's Portfolio of Investments and Portfolio Companies
data.meta_description: Search our portfolio to learn more about our investments and portfolio companies. Filter by asset class, industry, location, and company name.
data.text: The portfolio companies shown represent a significant portion of KKRâ€™s Private Equity, Tech Growth, Health Care Growth, Global Impact, Infrastructure and Real Assets portfolio as of March 31, 2024. Certain investments have been excluded where KKR only holds a minority or residual interest, or where the company is undergoing a restructuring. The specific portfolio companies identified are not representative of all of the portfolio companies purchased, sold, or recommended for KKR Funds, and it should not be assumed that any investment in an identified portfolio company was or will be profitable. Actual holdings will vary for each KKR Fund and there is no guarantee that a particular KKR Fund will hold any or all of the portfolio companies listed.
